description: Salah Abdeslam, a suspected mastermind and sole survivor of the 2015 attacks, is among 20 accused.
title: Paris attacks: French judges order trial for 20 suspects
title_page: Paris attacks: French judges order trial for 20 suspects - BBC News
maintext: In 2018, Abdeslam was given a 20-year jail term over the gunfight that led to his arrest in Belgium. In relation to the Paris attacks, he has refused to cooperate with investigators and remains in solitary confinement, AFP news agency reported.
